title: How to Make Fresh Lemonade Without a Juicer

steps.headline: Cut your lemons in half and then squeeze the juice into a glass.
steps.description: Use a standard squeezer for best results. Also, make sure to remove all the seeds from your lemons!

steps.headline: Add the 500ml of water and stir.
Add the sugar a little at a time.
steps.description: Stir and taste often to check sweetness. Too much sugar can overpower the lemon taste!

steps.headline: Put your lemonade in the fridge for 5-10 minutes.

text: Cut your lemons in half and then squeeze the juice into a glass. Use a standard squeezer for best results. Also, make sure to remove all the seeds from your lemons! Add the 500ml of water and stir.  Add the sugar a little at a time. Stir and taste often to check sweetness. Too much sugar can overpower the lemon taste! Put your lemonade in the fridge for 5-10 minutes.  Add ice and stir.  Enjoy!
